modmenu.descriptionTranslation.difficult: Make block-breaking more challenging or do nothing at all.
option.difficultyd.randomnumbers.tooptip: Toggle to display random numbers in chat.
option.difficultyd.disable.tooptip: If disabled, the mod does nothing.
option.difficultyd.blockwhitelistdisable: Whitelist blocks to exclude from probability drops.
option.difficultyd.blockwhitelist.toopti: Add block IDs to exempt from probability drops.
option.difficultyd.hasSilkTouch.tooptip: Adjust drop probability for Silk Touch tools.
option.difficultyd.hasFortune.tooptip: Adjust drop probability for Fortune tools.
option.difficultyd.normal.tooptip: Adjust drop probability for regular tools.
option.difficultyd.emptyhanded.tooptip: No item drops without a tool if enabled.
option.difficultyd.emptyhandedchance.too: Adjust drop probability without a tool.
option.difficultyd.slowblockwhitelistdis: Whitelist blocks to exclude from slow mining.
option.difficultyd.slowblockwhitelist.to: Add block IDs to exempt from slow mining.
option.difficultyd.slowmining: Reduce mining speed for breaking blocks:
option.difficultyd.slowminingspeed.toopt: Adjust block breaking speed in survival mode.
option.difficultyd.foodlevel.tooptip: Enable chance to consume hunger when breaking blocks.
option.difficultyd.exhaustionlevel.toopt:
Enable chance to increase exhaustion when breaking blocks.
Learn more about 'exhaustion':
